price: Ampa sε, Yɛnim yie sεdeε wͻrekeka no si fa ha wo wͻ w’akoma mu.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدۡرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad naʿlamu annaka yaḍīqu ṣadruka bimā yaqūlūna
